meanings.sent1: She kept mistranslating the words in the book.
meanings.sent2: He realized he was mistranslating the message from Spanish to English.
meanings.sent3: The robot was hilariously mistranslating the instructions, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: Her tired brain was like a broken machine, constantly mistranslating reality.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of mistranslating can be quite serious in international relations.

meanings.definition: To interpret or render incorrectly in another language.
meanings.sent1: They were mistranslating the poem during the language class.
meanings.sent2: The software was constantly mistranslating the phrases into French.
meanings.sent3: The parrot was comically mistranslating everything the owner said.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like a faulty translator, always mistranslating his thoughts.
meanings.sent5: Mistranslating can lead to misunderstandings and confusion in communication.
